# The full version, including alpha/beta/rc tags autosummary_generate = True

‘sphinx.ext.autodoc’, ‘sphinx.ext.mathjax’, ‘sphinx.ext.autosummary’, ‘sphinx.ext.autosectionlabel’, ‘sphinx.ext.viewcode’, ‘sphinx.ext.napoleon’, ‘sphinx.ext.coverage’, ‘sphinx_tabs.tabs’]

# Add any paths that contain templates here, relative to this directory. templates_path = [‘templates’]

# List of patterns, relative to source directory, that match files and # directories to ignore when looking for source files. # This pattern also affects html_static_path and html_extra_path. exclude_patterns = [‘_build’, ‘Thumbs.db’, ‘.DS_Store’]
